statements: SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_behavior FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE purchase_behavior = 'Frequent Shopper';
SELECT customer_name, gender, age FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(purchase_history->'items') AS total_items FROM customers WHERE purchase_behavior='Frequent Shopper' ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_history->>'last_purchase_date' AS last_purchase FROM customers WHERE purchase_history->'items' @> '[{"product": "Shirt"}]';
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM purchases
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, quantity FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 5
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age >= 25 AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT customer_id, name, email, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 40 ORDER BY email DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, region, income FROM customers LEFT JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE region = 'North';
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers
SELECT region, income FROM demographics
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount >= 100
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, location, income FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id;
SELECT purchase_id, total_amount FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_gender FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, location, income FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_gender FROM customers;
SELECT name, age FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments JOIN segments ON customer_segments.segment_id = segments.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.name, p.product_name, p.price, p.purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.price > 50 ORDER BY p.price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT d.location, d.income, d.education_level, c.name FROM demographics d JOIN customers c ON d.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE d.income > 50000 ORDER BY d.location ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT s.segment_name, s.description, c.name FROM segments s JOIN customer_segments cs ON s.segment_id = cs.segment_id JOIN customers c ON cs.customer_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY s.segment_name ASC LIMIT 5;
